entries.journal_entry_description: Boshaz informed you that Dakar, one of his clan mates, has more information on what needs to be done in order to take care of the Blackscale. Find and talk to Dakar.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Boshaz has told you to track down Dakar and speak with him about the next task that the Zssik clan has in store for you.
